content.html: @messypixels has published her findings on how companies supported their employees during the attack on the capitol on 6 January. You can read the blogpost here: angeliqueweger.com/blog/2021/lead‚Ä¶ Thought provoking for anyone reflecting on their own company's response (or job-hunting).

content.html: Thanks for sharing! I'm about to become permanently remote, and am looking forward to figuring out how to work remotely while not in a pandemic.
content.text: Thanks for sharing! I'm about to become permanently remote, and am looking forward to figuring out how to work remotely while not in a pandemic.

content.html: When we all went remote I took a chair, monitor, and laptop stand from the office. Now that we are talking about going back to the office, I did the math on what it would take to maintain the same setup at home/work: $1540. If I want to duplicate my fancy camera setup: $1040. üëÄ
content.text: When we all went remote I took a chair, monitor, and laptop stand from the office. Now that we are talking about going back to the office, I did the math on what it would take to maintain the same setup at home/work: $1540. If I want to duplicate my fancy camera setup: $1040. üëÄ
